alert.note: Alert for Judith Basin (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 4:12PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Judith Basin County through 445 PM MDT... At 412 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles southwest of Stanford, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ackley Lake State Park, Sapphire Village, Windham, Utica and Moccasin. This includes Highway 200 between mile markers 43 and 57. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
